name: Bepi Ciosoto Ristorante Hotel

reviews.text: We've spent 5 nights during the Venice Carnival in this hotel. We chose it mainly because of the good rates and we were surprised to find such a service at only 2 stars.
reviews.title: Excellent service, great value for money

description: Bepi el Ciosoto hotel in Venice, 2 star hotel with unbeatable rates Superior rooms equipped with every comfort & nice restaurant, a few minutes from Venice, the Riviera del Brenta, for visits to the Venetian Villas and the center of Venice
